name: thedailydevil
body:
Why did you lie to me?
I was always your friend.
I made mistakes and all but you understood.
I never lied to you.
And up until last night you never lied to me.
So please tell me, why did you lie to me?
Of course, now that I'm dead, I'll never know.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
